verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My soul He doth restore again, And me to walk doth make Within the paths of righteousness, E’en for His own name’s sake.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Goodness and mercy all my life Shall surely follow me, And in God’s house forevermore My dwelling-place shall be.{/lang-eng}
